p: Generally, at the maximum oil concentration in the soil equal to 12%, the above-ground shoot fresh weight was 2.3 times lower in the Krona variety and, respectively, 1.3 times lower in the Valdai variety compared to the control. At the same time, the root dry weight was 4.1 times (Krona variety) and 3.3 times (Valdai variety) lower than that of the control plants.
